'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A high quality blacksmithy operated by Marihi and catering to the wealthy.

==Characters==
* [[Marihi]], proprietor.
* [[Izzia]], craftswoman who takes an interest in your belongings. Only appears after the [[Neketaka#Encounters|encounter]] with [[The Steel Garrote]] agents, which occurs at random whilst travelling to or from [[Periki's Overlook]], after collecting one of the base pieces of the [[Crown of the Exiled Queen]].

==Loot==
* [[Spearcaster]], [[Tuotilo's Palm]], [[Queen's Rule]], [[Lovers Embrace]], and [[Devil of Caroc Breastplate]]: On sale
* [[Whispers of Yenwood (Deadfire)|Whispers of Yenwood]], [[Blade of the Endless Paths (Deadfire)|Blade of the Endless Paths]], or [[Whispers of the Endless Paths]]: Repaired by Marihi
* [[Devil of Caroc Breastplate]]: Available for purchase, or can be stolen from the [[Mechanics|Difficulty]] 14 chest to the left of the table (only if [[Devil of Caroc]] spared [[Harmke]] in the events of {{poe1}}).
* [[Tuotilo's Palm]]: Available for purchase, or can be stolen from the [[Mechanics|Difficulty]] 13 chest in the corner. Marihi carries the [[Marihi's Key|key]] to this chest.

==Trivia==
* While the location name is "Marihi's Metalwork", the name of the shop in the UI is "Marihi's Metal''craft''".
